report.title: Occurrence list for boundary
report.description: A general purpose list of records filtered to the contents of a boundary.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM occurrences o JOIN samples s ON s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted = FALSE JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttlpref ON ttlpref.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id AND ttlpref.preferred='t' AND ttlpref.deleted=false JOIN taxa tpref ON tpref.id=ttlpref.taxon_id AND tpref.deleted=false JOIN taxon_groups tg on tg.id=tpref.taxon_group_id and tg.deleted=false LEFT JOIN taxa tcommon ON tcommon.id=ttlpref.common_taxon_id AND tcommon.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id #joins# WHERE o.deleted = FALSE AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(tpref.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='') AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(s.geom, ST_MakeValid(st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913)))) AND (#sref_max_size#=-1 OR #sref_max_size# >= CASE WHEN lower(s.entered_sref_system) = 'osgb' THEN CASE WHEN length(s.entered_sref)=5 THEN 2000 ELSE power(10, (6-(length(s.entered_sref)/2))) END WHEN lower(s.entered_sref_system) = 'osie' THEN power(10, (5-(length(s.entered_sref)/2))) ELSE 1 END) AND #website_filter# #idlist# #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, s.id as sample_id, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, s.entered_sref, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, ttl.id as taxa_taxon_list_id, tpref.taxon, tcommon.taxon as common, tg.title as taxon_group, st_astext(s.geom) as geom, CASE WHEN lower(s.entered_sref_system) = 'osgb' THEN CASE WHEN length(s.entered_sref)=5 THEN 2000 ELSE power(10, (6-(length(s.entered_sref)/2))) END WHEN lower(s.entered_sref_system) = 'osie' THEN power(10, (5-(length(s.entered_sref)/2))) ELSE 1 END as sref_size, length(s.entered_sref) / 24.0 as fillopacity, length(s.entered_sref) / 3 as strokewidth, o.zero_abundance

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: taxon_group_id
param.description: Select the taxon group to return data for, or leave for all groups
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM taxon_groups

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: sref_max_size
param.display: Max size of a grid ref
param.description: Enter the maximimum size of a grid reference in metres, e.g. 1000 for a 1km grid ref. Leaf blank for no grid ref size filter.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report
